finely.translation[0].definitions[0].def: into very thin or very small pieces
finely.translation[0].definitions[1].def: in a very careful, delicate, or exact way
finely.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: These instruments are very finely tuned.
finely.translation[0].definitions[2].exa: He wore a silk cloak over a finely embroidered robe.
